Norway Post, 
 350th Anniv. 
          A394 

   Post-World  War  II  development:  No.  1160, 
Tools  for  construction,  1945.  No.  1161,  Kon- 
Tiki Expedition, 1947. No. 1162, Environmen- 
tal  protection,  establishing  national  parks, 
1962. No. 1163, Welfare, help for the elderly, 
1967.  No.  1164,  Off-shore  oil  drilling,  1969. 
No.  1165,  Grete  Waitz,  marathon  winner, 
1983.  No.  1166,  Askoy  Bridge,  1992.  No. 
1167,  Winter  Olympic  Games,  Lillehammer, 
1994.
